Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the #97 Skokie bus, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/Western
ShortDescription: NB 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via: Halsted, Western, Lincoln, and Halsted, due to, street blockage, near Halsted/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via: Halsted, Western, Lincoln, and Halsted, due to, street blockage, near Halsted/Western.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near 51st/State
ShortDescription: SB 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via: State, 51st, Wabash, 55th and State, due to, street blockage, near 51st/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via: State, 51st, Wabash, 55th and State, due to, street blockage, near 51st/State.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
